targets.rawSql:
SELECT  jt.source_systems, jt.`type`, jt.status, 
 SUM(IF(jt.resolved > 0, jw.duration/3600 , 0 )) AS 'Trial Ticket Hours spent'
FROM grafana_data.jira_worklogs jw 
LEFT JOIN grafana_data.jira_tickets jt ON jw.jiraticketid = jt.id
WHERE jt.ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND jt.`type` LIKE 'Pre Conversion Data Fix%'
AND jt.source_systems IN ($SourceSystem)
AND status IN ($Status)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)

SELECT  jt.source_systems, jt.`type`, jt.status, 
 SUM(IF(jt.resolved > 0, jw.duration/3600 , 0 )) AS 'Production Ticket Hours spent'
FROM grafana_data.jira_worklogs jw 
LEFT JOIN grafana_data.jira_tickets jt ON jw.jiraticketid = jt.id
WHERE jt.ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND jt.`type` LIKE 'Post Conversion Data Fix%'
AND jt.source_systems IN ($SourceSystem)
AND status IN ($Status)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)

SELECT COUNT(jt.ticketnumber) AS 'Trial Tickets', jt.source_systems, jt.`type` 
FROM grafana_data.jira_worklogs jw 
LEFT JOIN grafana_data.jira_tickets jt ON jw.jiraticketid = jt.id
WHERE jt.ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND jt.`type` LIKE 'Pre Conversion Data Fix%'
AND jt.source_systems IN ($SourceSystem)
AND jt.status IN ($Status)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)

SELECT COUNT(jt.ticketnumber) AS 'Production Tickets', jt.source_systems, jt.`type` FROM grafana_data.jira_worklogs jw 
LEFT JOIN grafana_data.jira_tickets jt ON jw.jiraticketid = jt.id
WHERE jt.ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND jt.`type` LIKE 'Post Conversion Data Fix%'
AND jt.source_systems IN ($SourceSystem)
AND jt.status IN ($Status)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)

SELECT
  DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) AS "Created Date", source_systems,
  COUNT(*) AS 'Pre-Conversion'
FROM 
  grafana_data.jira_tickets jt
WHERE jt.type = 'Pre Conversion Data Fix'
AND source_systems IN ($SourceSystem )
AND status IN ($Status)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
GROUP BY date(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))

SELECT
  DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) AS "Created Date",
  COUNT(*) AS 'Post-Conversion'
FROM 
  grafana_data.jira_tickets jt
WHERE jt.type = 'Post Conversion Data Fix'
AND source_systems IN ($SourceSystem )
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
GROUP BY date(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))

SELECT source_systems, COUNT(ticketnumber) AS 'numberOfTIckets', FROM_UNIXTIME(created), FROM_UNIXTIME(resolved)
FROM grafana_data.jira_tickets 
WHERE ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND `type` LIKE 'Pre Conversion Data Fix%'
AND epic IS NOT NULL
AND source_systems <> ''
AND source_systems IN ($SourceSystem)
AND status IN ($Status)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
GROUP BY source_systems

SELECT source_systems, COUNT(ticketnumber) AS 'numberOfTIckets', FROM_UNIXTIME(created), FROM_UNIXTIME(resolved)
FROM grafana_data.jira_tickets 
WHERE ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND `type` LIKE 'Post Conversion Data Fix%'
AND epic IS NOT NULL
AND source_systems <> ''
AND source_systems IN ($SourceSystem)
AND status IN ($Status)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
GROUP BY source_systems

SELECT
	DISTINCT 
	YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) AS `Year`,
	WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) AS `Week`,
	CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) AS 'value'
FROM
	grafana_data.jira_tickets jt
	WHERE
	CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
	AND 
	CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)

SELECT
	ROUND(AVG(pre_conv.`Number of Tickets`), 2) AS 'Average Trial Tickets per project',
	ROUND(AVG(post_conv.`Number of Tickets`), 2) AS 'Average Production Tickets per project'
FROM
	(
	SELECT
		jt.`epic` AS 'Epic Ticket',
		COUNT(*) AS 'Number of Tickets'
	FROM
		grafana_data.jira_tickets jt
	WHERE
		jt.ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
		AND jt.type = 'Pre Conversion Data Fix'
		AND jt.status IN ('Done', 'No Work Required')
		AND jt.`epic` IS NOT NULL
	GROUP BY
		jt.epic) AS pre_conv
	LEFT JOIN
	(
	SELECT
		jt.`epic` AS 'Epic Ticket',
		COUNT(*) AS 'Number of Tickets'
	FROM
		grafana_data.jira_tickets jt
	WHERE
		jt.ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
		AND jt.type = 'Post Conversion Data Fix'
		AND jt.status IN ('Done', 'No Work Required')
			AND jt.`epic` IS NOT NULL
		GROUP BY
			jt.epic) AS post_conv 
	ON pre_conv.`Epic Ticket` = post_conv.`Epic Ticket`;

panels.title: Average Number of Trial and Production tickets per project

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(IF(jt.resolved > 0, jw.duration/3600 , 0 )) AS 'Trial Ticket Hours spent'
FROM grafana_data.jira_worklogs jw 
LEFT JOIN grafana_data.jira_tickets jt ON jw.jiraticketid = jt.id
WHERE jt.ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND jt.`type` LIKE 'Pre Conversion Data Fix%'
AND jt.source_systems IN ($SourceSystem)
AND status IN ($Status)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)

SELECT SUM(IF(jt.resolved > 0, jw.duration/3600 , 0 )) AS 'Production Ticket Hours spent'
FROM grafana_data.jira_worklogs jw 
LEFT JOIN grafana_data.jira_tickets jt ON jw.jiraticketid = jt.id
WHERE jt.ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND jt.`type` LIKE 'Post Conversion Data Fix%'
AND jt.source_systems IN ($SourceSystem)
AND status IN ($Status)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
AND CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)

panels.title: What do you get when a cow jumps over a barbed wire fence?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT source_systems, COUNT(ticketnumber) AS 'Trial Tickets Raised', name, assignee, type, FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created), status, FROM_UNIXTIME(resolved), epic
FROM grafana_data.jira_tickets jt
WHERE ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND `type` LIKE 'Pre Conversion Data Fix%'
AND epic IS NOT NULL
AND source_systems <> ''
AND source_systems IN ('$SourceSystem')
AND
	CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
	AND 
	CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(jt.created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
GROUP BY source_systems

SELECT COUNT(ticketnumber) AS 'Production Tickets raised', source_systems, `type` FROM grafana_data.jira_tickets
WHERE ticketnumber LIKE 'CONV-%'
AND `type` LIKE 'Post Conversion Data Fix%'
AND source_systems LIKE '$SourceSystem'
AND
	CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) >= CAST(CONCAT('$FROM_YEAR', LPAD('$FROM_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)
	AND 
	CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)), IF(WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)) < 10, CONCAT('0', WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created))), WEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(created)))) AS SIGNED) <= CAST(CONCAT('$TO_YEAR', LPAD('$TO_ISO_WEEK', 2, '0')) AS SIGNED)

panels.title: $SourceSystem Trial/Production Tickets raised from $FROM_YEAR W$FROM_ISO_WEEK to $TO_YEAR W$TO_ISO_WEEK

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT jt.source_systems as 'Source System' FROM grafana_data.jira_tickets jt
WHERE source_systems != ''
AND source_systems not in ('Advatnage', 'All', 'no', 'other', 'N/A', 'cascadiaequine', 'ElizabethBishop', 'AvantikaKarki', "MisheScott", 'AvantikaKarki', 'psivpm', 'ginger')
order by source_systems
list.label: Source System
list.name: SourceSystem
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT jt.source_systems as 'Source System' FROM grafana_data.jira_tickets jt
WHERE source_systems != ''
AND source_systems not in ('Advatnage', 'All', 'no', 'other', 'N/A', 'cascadiaequine', 'ElizabethBishop', 'AvantikaKarki', "MisheScott", 'AvantikaKarki', 'psivpm', 'ginger')
order by source_systems

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT status FROM grafana_data.jira_tickets WHERE `type` IN ("Pre Conversion Data Fix", "Post Conversion Data Fix");
list.label: Status
list.name: Status
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT status FROM grafana_data.jira_tickets WHERE `type` IN ("Pre Conversion Data Fix", "Post Conversion Data Fix");
